Fresh back from SGC is this 1912 T207 George Chalmers card with Recruit Little Cigars back.

It has been graded an 80 (6) EX/NM by SGC.  This truly is a beauty!  No creases, wrinkles, rips or tears.  Very clean surface both front and back.  Centering is also quite good, a bit off on the back.

$170.00 delivered THIS CARD HAS BEEN SOLD

Please email me (Nhale5516@aol.com)with any questions or if you need more photos.


I also have this T202 Triple Folder "Just Before the Battle" PSA 4 for sale.  I listed it here once before but that thread got buried.  Looking to get 275 delivered.  Email me at Nhale5516@aol.com if interested.
